channel.title: Alaris - Fun Custom Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=4]Links[/SIZE] [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/669mc8fdxn4x87z/Alaris.jar?dl=1"]Download Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.alaris.org/vote"]Vote[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.alaris.org/hiscores"]Hiscores[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.alaris.org/forums"]Forums[/URL]
[SIZE=4]Intro[/SIZE] Alaris is a fun eco based server meaning items/gp is quite easy to obtain. There is some challenges to Alaris which will be our completionist cape. There are currently 22 tasks for you to complete along with maxing your total level. Alaris also has some bosses for some of the more better items in the game Ex- Nex, Chaotics, Drygores. We also have semi-active pking with notifications for deep wildy pking. This is meant to be easy and fun if this is not your type of server please just leave a simple goodluck.
[SIZE=4]Some Notable Features[/SIZE] 5+ Wilderness bosses Wilderness activity points Boss Kill Logs Some Custom Items Plenty of other Bosses Fun/easy Economy NPC\Player Clipping Completionist Cape + Achievements Gambler NPC (Gamble Vote points and Gold) Mithril seeds IPB forums Auto Vote Hiscores Boss pets + custom boss pet Some new osrs Items Quick Prayers Plenty of Npcs to fight Custom Pirate Minigame Fast Leveling & More come check us out

item.title: Alaris - Fun Custom Server
item.dc:creator: @Clipcinemahd Clipcinemahd
item.description:
@Clipcinemahd wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=4]Links[/SIZE]
Download Client
Vote
Hiscores
Forums

[SIZE=4]Intro[/SIZE]
Alaris is a fun eco based server meaning items/gp is quite easy to obtain. There is some challenges to Alaris which will be our completionist cape. There are currently 22 tasks for you to complete along with maxing your total level. Alaris also has some bosses for some of the more better items in the game Ex- Nex, Chaotics, Drygores. We also have semi-active pking with notifications for deep wildy pking. This is meant to be easy and fun if this is not your type of server please just leave a simple goodluck.

[SIZE=4]Some Notable Features[/SIZE]
5+ Wilderness bosses
Wilderness activity points
Boss Kill Logs
Some Custom Items
Plenty of other Bosses
Fun/easy Economy
NPC\Player Clipping
Completionist Cape + Achievements
Gambler NPC (Gamble Vote points and Gold)
Mithril seeds
IPB forums
Auto Vote
Hiscores
Boss pets + custom boss pet
Some new osrs Items
Quick Prayers
Plenty of Npcs to fight
Custom Pirate Minigame
Fast Leveling
& More come check us out
